channel.title: People Dupeing
channel.description: Hi, Ive Worked On My Server (delta) it's really good but yesterday some 1 was dupeing ags on it, and i couldnt stop them cause i did not kno how there doing it! it's ruining the economy please tell me how the hell to fix this :'(

item.title: People Dupeing
item.dc:creator: @Michaelmmm Michaelmmm
item.description:
@Michaelmmm wrote:

rsc =.=… im talking about delta source… not other servers, the thing i heard was that each, server/source has a speical way to dupe in it. like in a few others they dropped stuff then tele grabbed dupped it. and that was for hustlascape/boratscape source. what is the delta one…

man im goona spend the whole week end trying to fix this F ing mess :l

Read full topic

item.title: People Dupeing
item.dc:creator: @Jpark Jpark
item.description:
@Jpark wrote:

well, in rsc, ppl would climb up a ladder, drop some thing, then go down the ladder for 5 seconds, then go up and take the item, but there would be an extra item… just bann who ever duped, lulz.

Read full topic

item.title: People Dupeing
item.dc:creator: @Michaelmmm Michaelmmm
item.description:
@Michaelmmm wrote:

i dont have a working duel arena lmao… that can possibly be it… my server “MikeyScape” takes place in edge vill
and if set up with shops and everything. and a few quests, ( from delta100%) so what are they doing to dupe?
i really want to beat the hell out of the hackers/dupers!!!

Read full topic

item.title: People Dupeing
item.dc:creator: @Jpark Jpark
item.description:
@Jpark wrote:

hmm, in rs2, ppl duped by dueling, so for example, when some 1 duels, and they stake, like 1m when they accept the 1st duel and the staker accepts the 2nd, the other person declines so he also gets the 1m for some reason, so u ahouls jus bann the person, and if does it again, ip bann for no mersy.

Read full topic

item.description:

ive delted the ags from people(char files) and iped them, but it does not stop the process. just tell me how the f to fix it please.

item.title: People Dupeing
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

On a leeched server, this kind of stuff doesn’t really matter. If you really want to fix it just use the search button.
